exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x, y, z : Z_Zp Unable to unify "?M1455 = ?M1456" with "proj1_sig (y ⊕ z ⊕ x) = proj1_sig (x ⊕ y ⊕ z)".
Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros x y z. rewrite Zp_plus_comm. apply Zp_inj. simpl. apply lt_pirr. rewrite <- cmp_sub. destruct cmp_sub. - destruct s as [a Ha]. rewrite Zp_plus_comm. rewrite Zp_plus_zero. rewrite Zp_plus_comm in Ha. auto. - apply Zp_inj in n. rewrite n. rewrite Zp_plus_zero. apply Zp_inj. simpl. rewrite Nat.add_0_r. reflexivity.
